{"id":295865244,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1579529262,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/295865244/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"12.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def power(self, x, n):\n        if n==0:\n            return 1\n        half = self.power(x, n//2)\n        if n%2==1:\n            return x * half * half\n        else:\n            return half * half\n    \n    def myPow(self, x, n):\n        if x==0:\n            return 0\n        \n        res = self.power(x, abs(n))\n        if n < 0:\n            return 1/res\n        else:\n            return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
